project.description: The name of the project to add ngx-formwork to.

registrationStyle.description: How components and validators will be registered. Possible values: token, map

provideInline.description: Put configuration of provideFormwork call directly in app.config.ts (defaults to false)

providerConfigPath.description: Where the provider configuration file should be placed, relative to the project root. Defaults to 'app'

providerConfigFileName.description: Name of the provider configuration file. Defaults to 'formwork.config.ts'

includeSyncValidators.description: Whether to include the setup for validators

includeAsyncValidators.description: Whether to include the setup for async validators

useHelper.description: Include helper files for view providers and host directives

helperPath.description: Where helper files should be placed, relative to the project root. Defaults to 'app/shared/helper'

splitRegistrations.description: Whether to split the registrations into a separate file

registrationsPath.description: Where registration files should be placed, relative to the project root. Defaults to 'app/registrations'

useSchematicConfig.description: Whether to include an extra file for schematics configuration. If set to false, all configuration for the schematics will be set up in angular.json

schematicsConfigPath.description: Where the schematics config should be placed, relative to the project root. Defaults to 'app'

schematicConfigFileName.description: Name of the schematic config file. Defaults to 'formwork.config.json'
